name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of May 1, in Dayu County, Jiangxi Province, a Tesla rolled in the air due to improper operation when making an emergency avoidance for pedestrians. The vehicle collided with road facilities and vehicles parked on the roadside, causing one person in the Tesla to be seriously injured, three people to be slightly injured, and nine vehicles to be damaged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/wze9CC9NW3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of May 2, the death toll from the Mei-Da Expressway landslide accident has risen to 48.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of May 2, the roadside in Changling was filled with police officers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 1, Chaozhou, Guangdong. A black Land Rover crashed into shops and pedestrians along the street.
According to the police report, three people had a dispute with the driver and pulled the car door to try to stop the driver from leaving. During this period, the car lost control and the driver abandoned the car and fled the scene after the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/ee1nfJU1dB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 1, Baoshan City, Yunnan. The Internet revealed that China Railway Tunnel Company owed workers wages, and workers were forced to jump from a height. The video showed a man kneeling and kowtowed to the police, and a worker with blood on the corner of his mouth was lying in a truck next to him. Other workers kept saying "Go to the hospital first, send him to the hospital quickly."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 1, Zhang Yongzhen wrote a message, thanking netizens and the public for their support. After coordination with the higher authorities, it has been preliminarily agreed to resume normal scientific research activities in the laboratory. Team members can enter and leave the laboratory freely for the time being. The Public Health Center will further negotiate and resolve issues such as the laboratory's relocation plan.
The Weibo topic #Shanghai Public Health Clinical Center Fan Xiaohong persecutes scientists# has been removed from the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Chongqing Gas said that according to statistics, there were 1,182 cases of overcharges involving 2,858,545.83 yuan, and the company has cleared and disposed of all of them. However, some residents said that they did not receive any refunds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Chengdu homeowner on the Sichuan government platform asked the government for help, hoping that measures would be introduced to stabilize housing prices as soon as possible.
The owner left a message: The house price has dropped severely now. The house I bought for 2.28 million in 2021 has now dropped to 1.6 million, almost equal to my loan. I spent 820,000 on the down payment that year, and I have to pay 7,800 every month, which is difficult to repay.
The owner said that he understood that the current decline in housing prices is an inevitable trend, but he could not accept such a rapid decline, and hoped that the government would introduce measures to stabilize housing prices. People who buy houses at high prices should not be allowed to think about stopping payment and have some motivation to live.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 1, a report that "U.S. Department of Labor officials called on international companies to leave Xinjiang due to forced labor in Xinjiang" resonated with netizens. Netizens left comments in the comment area complaining that they were also forced to work overtime. As of now, there are only 9 comments on the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 1, a villager from Zhuangzi Village, Bazhou City, Hebei Province, revealed that after the Hebei flood in August last year, the flood-fighting materials supported by the state were piled up in the open air and exposed to wind and rain for more than half a year, and were never distributed to the people. In addition, he also issued a letter of complaint, questioning whether someone had defrauded the state of flood discharge compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Qmn56NTpg3

content: https://t.co/FmpLmW6FYR

content: https://t.co/hDo5LQ6Bda

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 2, Weihai City, Shandong Province, the families of the victims of the maritime accident mourned the dead at the dock
It is said that on November 15, 2022, the fishing boat Liaowayu 75103, which sailed out from Zhukou Village, Renhe Town, Rongcheng City, Weihai City, Shandong Province, had a maritime accident. There were 11 people on board, and 9 died
However, for more than a year, the government concealed the report, the departments shirked the responsibility, the fishing boat owner did not bear any responsibility, and there was no compensation. At the same time, the families of the victims were prohibited from petitioning, and the bodies of the victims are still in the funeral home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 1, in Luyi County, Henan Province, the Zhiyuan Food Factory had been in arrears of wages for ten years, and the workers took to the streets to protest for their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/yPOP3YocCB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 26, Beijing. An old man with a wound on his face queued up outside the National Bureau of Letters and Calls at midnight to petition. The old man said that the wound on his face was caused by a beating by a village cadre.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Chinese children"
May 1, Zhengzhou, Henan. A 14-year-old girl wanted to jump off a building due to the pressure of studying, but was rescued by the owner.
The girl cried, "I can't go to school anymore, I'm so tired, they said I must pass the exam, they said I must do well..."
The owner comforted her warmly, "Scores cannot judge a person's performance. When you enter society, we don't judge a person by test scores."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today, amidst escalating personal attacks against my parents that living in China, I have consented to disclose in full detail the transnational repression exerted by the authorities of the People‘s Republic of China and their proxies in Italy against me.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I hope that everyone can see more than just the infringement I suffered as an individual for the freedom of the press in China.
What happened to me also proves their fear of freedom of the press and freedom of speech.
In the past two years, everyone has witnessed the power of the news. Together, we broke through the news blockade to promote changes in ordinary oppression.
Yes, even laymen can do this. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @SafeguardDefend Since March, the Chinese government has been utilizing a significant number of bot accounts on X to spread false narratives, launch personal attacks, and engage in defamation against both myself and my parents. On a daily basis, I receive approximately hundreds of such messages…
